Dubai Hills is a master-planned development in Mohammad bin Rashid City that is being developed as a joint venture between Emaar & Meraas. Web_Remarks:
Aaronz and Co is delighted to present this spacious studio for Sale, located In the heart of the most vibrant waterfront communities in Dubai; Dubai Marina. Sparkle Towers stand out as a distinct architecture of two interconnected towers that are enveloped by the hues of Swarovski studded interiors.

Property Details:

- Tower 2
- Spacious Studio
- Bathroom
- Balcony
- Marina view
- Vacant
- Unfurnished
- Size: 412 sq. ft.

About the Property:

Sparkle Towers is a luxury residential project being developed by Dubai-based developer Tebyan in collaboration with Austrian crystal company Swarovski. The project consists of twin towers that will offer luxurious living space and a fine locale to dine, shop, and unwind. Dubbed as Space Marveled by Swarovski, the project was officially launched in October 2014. They are designed to feature sparkling interiors and exteriors that will be enhanced by dazzling lighting applications and crystal adornments in the interior.

Facilities:

Fitness centers, temperature-controlled swimming pools, jacuzzis, and spas add to the opulence of the luxurious living offered by Sparkle Towers. Separate spa and jacuzzi facilities are available for women. The towers will have large open spaces, such as designer landscapes, large gardens, and indoor and outdoor play areas. A separate pool with lifeguards will be available for children. A mini-cafeteria will serve the guests in the lounge, outdoor garden, or swimming pool. CCTV cameras will be installed for surveillance and security. Around the clock, concierge service and optional cleaning packages will be made available to the residents to enhance their comfort. Other facilities such as valet parking and on-demand limousine will also be provided.

Dubai Industrial Park (Dubai Industrial City)is a designated district within Dubai Wholesale City, one of the largest industrial hubs in Dubai. DIC established with the objective of fast-tracking growth & expansion of the industrial sector in the UAE. Dubai Industrial Park (DIP) is the residential sector of Dubai Industrial City (DLC). Dubai Industrial Park offers a wide range of villas & townhouses for rent and sale at affordable prices. There are office spaces, commercial properties, showrooms, and storage yards nearby. The mixed-use development of Dubai Industrial Park offers residents a peaceful environment. The residential properties are set amidst stunning landscapes and are surrounded by several facilities. It is one of the popular areas to buy villas in Dubai. The community features a mix of international and local enterprises and the commercial units in the locality aim to contribute to the industrial sector.

Dubai South is a key area of Dubai, it will host the World Expo 2020 which is a highly anticipated event for the whole country.
